abstract: More than 2,500 University of Mississippi students, employees and other supporters of Chancellor Daniel W Jones demonstrate against unexpected decision to remove him; criticize plan to change leaders as veiled in secrecy and perilous to future of university.
lead_paragraph: University of Mississippi students, employees and other supporters of Daniel W. Jones criticized the plan to change leaders as wrapped in secrecy and threatening to the future of a place that has often been central to the image of the state.

headline.main: Thousands Protest Plan to Oust University Chief in Mississippi
headline.print_headline: Thousands Protest Plan to Oust University Chief in Mississippi

snippet: University of Mississippi students, employees and other supporters of Daniel W. Jones criticized the plan to change leaders as wrapped in secrecy and threatening to the future of a place that has often been central to the image of the state.
